homepage.message: Sivu is a bank of tutorials made by open source developers, to help beginners get started in the world of website development.

feature-section.title: A simple and straightforward experience
feature-section.description: Made for beginners, and written by beginners. We understand you.

accessible.title: Accessible
accessible.description: Sivu is easily accesible for anyone. We follow the WCAG to ensure the highest level of accesibility for our users.

themeable.title: Customisable
themeable.description: We show you how to create a site that's different and custom to you.

composable.title: Composable
composable.description: Designed with composition in mind. Compose new components with ease.

light-and-dark-ui.title: Light and Dark UI
light-and-dark-ui.description: Optimized for multiple color modes. Use light or dark, your choice.

developer-experience.title: Easy and Simple
developer-experience.description: Sivu is made by beginners, for beginners. We try to keep the language simple and understandable to help you better understand.

active-community.title: Active Community
active-community.description: We're a team of active maintainers ready to help you whenever you need.

built-with-chakra-section.title: We cover large frameworks too!
built-with-chakra-section.description: Some of the large website frameworks we cover!

growing-section.title: We love our contributors
growing-section.description: We're dedicated to improving Sivu. Thank you to all the contributors for helping us across this journey.

loved-by-product-people-section.title: Loved by product people like you

seo.title: Sivu - A bank of tutorials made by open source developers, to help beginners get started in the world of website development.
seo.description: A bank of tutorials made by open source developers, to help beginners get started in the world of website development.
